pullRequest.body:
An eventually constant functor from a cofiltered category admits a limit.

---

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message

nodes.body:
### PR summary [9390c5cdac](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/19021/commits/9390c5cdac3c9988e9f9d4a7e3e5772cc856c29d)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Limits.Constructions.EventuallyConstant` (new file)|533|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ IsEventuallyConstantFrom`
`+ IsEventuallyConstantTo`
`+ bowtie`
`+ cocone`
`+ coconeιApp`
`+ coconeιApp_eq`
`+ coconeιApp_eq_id`
`+ cone`
`+ coneπApp`
`+ coneπApp_eq`
`+ coneπApp_eq_id`
`+ hasColimit`
`+ hasLimit`
`+ instance [hF : IsEventuallyConstant F] [IsCofiltered J] : HasLimit F := by`
`+ instance [hF : IsEventuallyConstant F] [IsFiltered J] : HasColimit F := by`
`+ isColimitCocone`
`+ isIso_ι_of_isColimit`
`+ isIso_ι_of_isColimit'`
`+ isIso_π_of_isLimit`
`+ isIso_π_of_isLimit'`
`+ isLimitCone`
`+ postcomp`
`+ precomp`
`++ IsEventuallyConstant`
`++ isIso_map`
`++ isoMap`
`++ isoMap_hom_inv_id`
`++ isoMap_inv_hom_id`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>
🚀 Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by dagurtomas.

:v: joelriou can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Thanks for the review!

bors merge

```suggestion
If `J` is filtered, this implies `F` has a colimit. -/
def IsEventuallyConstantFrom (i : J) : Prop :=
```
Similarly in the cocone version below

pullRequest.title: feat(CategoryTheory): limits of eventually constant functors from cofiltered categories
